title: The Gathering Dark
description: After the war comes the darkness.Terisiare lies in ruins. Nations have fallen, goblins raid the land, and an oppressive faith throttles the city-states. Now deep within the walls of the Conclave of Mages, Jodah must decide if unlocking his own immense power is worth taking a step into the dark lands.The epic of the Ice Age begins.
author: Jeff Grubb
